name: Sword Game
description: Multiplayer. Versus. Co-op. Achievements. Stage-making. Swords. These are all words. And by random chance they also happen to describe all the major features of Sword Game, a free Action-Party game where up to 4 players can have a grand old time slashing and stabbing each other or CPUs. In addition, by an equally peculiar coincidence, none of those words contain the letter Q. Now that is odd.
